bpp/descriptor.name: Kiko Live
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Kiko Live began with a simple and unique idea â€“ to digitize and empower the local neighborhood retailers. From kiranas to pharmacies, from stationeries to paan-wallahs,from fashion to electronics, every local retailer can come on to our platform and use our app to organize and grow their home delivery business. Additionally, helps sellers sell to millions of new potential buyers on the ONDC network and exponentially grow their business.

descriptor.name: arhar dal
descriptor.short_desc: Introducing our premium quality arhar dal, the perfect addition to your pantry! Packed with essential nutrients and a rich source of protein, our arhar dal is carefully sourced and processed to ensure maximum flavor and freshness. Whether you're cooking a traditional Indian dish or experimenting with new recipes, our arhar dal will elevate your culinary creations. Experience the authentic taste and superior quality of our arhar dal and indulge in a wholesome and nutritious meal every time. Don't compromise on taste or quality, choose our arhar dal for a truly satisfying dining experience.

descriptor.name: aashriwaad dal
descriptor.short_desc: Experience the authentic taste of India with Aashriwaad dal. Made from the finest quality wheat grains, this premium dal is carefully ground to perfection, ensuring a soft and fluffy texture in every bite. Packed with essential nutrients and dietary fiber, Aashriwaad dal is the perfect choice for a healthy and wholesome meal. Whether you're making rotis, parathas, or any other Indian delicacy, Aashriwaad dal guarantees a delightful culinary experience. Trust the brand that has been nourishing generations with its superior quality dal. Choose Aashriwaad dal for a taste that truly satisfies.
